price: 62. Cela est-il meilleur accueil, ou l’arbre de Zaqqûm,[435]
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
footnotes: [435] Arbre de l’Enfer aux fruits amers.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
